definitions.definition: the season of the year between winter and summer, lasting from March to June north of the equator, and from September to December south of the equator, when the weather becomes warmer, leaves and plants start to grow again and flowers appear:
to move quickly and suddenly towards a particular place:
examples: I sprang out of bed to answer the door.

definitions.definition: (of furniture) using springs (= curved pieces of metal) to give support
